data.text:
General Terms and Conditions:

Eligible transactions: All valid send money transactions from the Joyalukkas Exchange Branch or Mobile App.

Transactions using Joyalukkas Exchange Branch Counter will be entitled to (1) entry in the electronic raffle draw for the Grand Prize – Renault Duster Car plus Spin & Win prizes.

Online transactions using Joyalukkas Exchange Mobile App will be entitled to (2) two entries in the electronic raffle draw for the Grand Prize – Renault Duster Car.

All Branches will have display QR Code. Customer will access the QR code, enter the unique coupon number from the receipt voucher and spin the wheel.

Customer need to present the spin prize display on his/her mobile to redeem prize.

One spin per transaction only.

Joyalukkas Exchange reserves the right to request proof of identity and the original receipt of the winning transaction from the winners, at the time of claiming the prizes.

The gift cannot be exchanged for cash at any Joyalukkas Exchange Branch.

Any cancel or refund transactions will not be included with the electronic raffle draw.

All branch electronic raffle entries must be submitted on or before 3rd May 2024.

Grand draw for Car prize will be on 6th May 2024.

All prizes must be claimed before the 15th June 2024

The grand draw prize winner will be officially contacted by authorized staff of Joyalukkas Exchange on the same day, using the customer information provided on e-raffle entries and their transaction receipt.

Joyalukkas Exchange will never ask customers their personal identification numbers, bank account details and other important documents or request the winners to pay any charges for claiming the prizes.

Unless and otherwise advised each winner agrees that upon entering the promotion, Joyalukkas Exchange may use their information in any media for future promotional, marketing and publicity purposes, without any further reference, payment or other compensation.

Joyalukkas Exchange employees are not eligible for the prize in the promotion.

For enquiries, please contact Ms. Ann Kathleen at +971506344594 or Exchange Marketing email: ex.bddxb2@joyalukkasexchange.com
